body_html:
This works for NFS in Windows.

What do you mean by "for NFS"? I want to use a local path.

Check if Enable Long File Path is indeed enabled in LocalGroupPolicyFolder > Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Filesystem > NTFS

Enable Long File Path is not located in the NTFS folder anymore but in LocalGroupPolicyFolder > Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Filesystem (Source)

I checked that the configuration was enabled and restarted the computer again (to be sure) but it still doesn't work. Did you try it?

(I installed tensorflow via pip in an anaconda environment if this matters)

What do you mean by "for NFS"? I want to use a local path.

Check if Enable Long File Path is indeed enabled in LocalGroupPolicyFolder > Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Filesystem > NTFS

Enable Long File Path is not located in the NTFS folder anymore but in  LocalGroupPolicyFolder > Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Filesystem (Source)
I checked that the configuration was enabled and restarted the computer again (to be sure) but it still doesn't work. Did you try it?
(I installed tensorflow via pip in an anaconda environment if this matters)
body:
> This works for NFS in Windows.

What do you mean by "for NFS"? I want to use a local path.

>  Check if `Enable Long File Path` is indeed enabled in `LocalGroupPolicyFolder > Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Filesystem > NTFS`

`Enable Long File Path` is not located in the NTFS folder anymore but in  `LocalGroupPolicyFolder > Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Filesystem` ([Source](https://superuser.com/a/1119980))

I checked that the configuration was enabled and restarted the computer again (to be sure) but it still doesn't work. Did you try it?

(I installed tensorflow via pip in an anaconda environment if this matters)
